Appendix 5 (Continued)
18o3 ETV Management Seminar. University of Wisconsin, August 24 - 27.
32 participants. (Ford)
Note: In addition to the above FAE-Ford supported seminars and workshops,
the NAEB has, during the past nine years run seven other such meet¬
ings (with funds provided by the Rockefeller and Kellogg Foundations),
18 NAEB Regional meetings (sponsored partly by the Kellogg Founda¬
tion and partly self-supporting), and participated jointly with the
JCET and station WOI-TV in an ETV seminar in 1952 underwritten by
the FAE. (See Appendix 8.)
